original_text: We know that we now have new life with God. Death no longer has power over us. We know this because we love our Christian friends. But anyone who does not love other believers is still under the power of death.
korean_text: 우리는 형제를 사랑함으로 사망에서 옮겨 생명으로 들어간 줄을 알거니와 사랑하지 아니하는 자는 사망에 머물러 있느니라

sentences.original_text: We know that we now have new life
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 이제 새로운 생명을 가졌다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: Death no longer has power over us
sentences.korean_translation: 죽음은 더 이상 우리에게 권세가 없습니다

sentences.original_text: because we love our Christian friends
But anyone who does not love other believers
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 신자들을 사랑하지 않는 사람은

sentences.original_text: is still under the power of death
